title: Marradith, Darkly
description: A world in which Marradith Ryder is a member of The Circle, and not Sojourner; a place where Leighton still lives, and Wolves gather to pass on the power of the Pack to a new generation. Can Rafael Castillo free himself from this mirror world of the one he came from, or will he die in the proccess?
author: Lori Titus
